programmes.show_description: It's the weekend, and we're showing out! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.
An exceptional Sharp selection - four hours of fantastic feelgood to help your weekend go off the deep end!
It's the weekend, and we're showing out! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.
U2's first decade of hits - including the three glorious videos from 1987's classic album 'The Joshua Tree.'
Non-stop '80s rock and power pop! From Queen, Bon Jovi and Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler and Tina Turner.
24 years of rock classics from the biggest band of the era - Queen! From '73's Keep Yourself Alive to '96's Too Much Love Will Kill You - via a multitude of all-time rock anthems.
All '80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!
Strap yourself in as Andy takes you back to late 80s teatime on BBC1 - Blue Peter, Grange Hill & Neighbours - plus 30 of the very best feel-good chart bangers from that era!
All '80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!
Timmy's back with something a little different - a run through of his favourite '80s bands, many interviewed on his 'Timmy on the Tranny' radio show throughout the decade!
All '80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!
You may remember the artists, but do you recall their lesser heard songs? With Style Council, Boy George, Chris Rea, Billy Idol & Squeeze.
Sixty minutes of lesser heard hits from 1987. Including Nick Kamen, Kenny G, Climie Fisher, The Jets and Boogie Box High.
Jenny Powell flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1987 had 'No Limits' on the TV & Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranking an endless stream of massive, catchy hits!
NOW 9 was released in 1987 and featured all the tracks of the moment. A double vinyl or double tape, the choice was yours - but the double CD had to wait until NOW 10!
NOW 9 was released in 1987 and featured all the tracks of the moment. A double vinyl or double tape, the choice was yours - but the double CD had to wait until NOW 10!
All killer - no filler! The anthems that made a decade - from Madonna to Prince, Michael to George, Duran Duran to Pet Shop Boys.
Radio 1 and Top of the Pops legend Gary Davies with the iconic images and award-winning clips that set the style of 1987. Including New Order, Wax, Guns N' Roses and the Beastie Boys.
All killer - no filler! The anthems that made a decade - from Madonna to Prince, Michael to George, Duran Duran to Pet Shop Boys.
From the decade that invented the power ballad - non-stop love songs, back to back.

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.

programmes.show_name: Where Did THAT No.1 Come From?!
programmes.show_description: Sixty minutes of novelty hits and terrifying chart toppers - all of them came out of nowhere, and all of them topped the UK charts!

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Two hours of the biggest party tunes from 40 years ago! Including Geno, Stomp, Atomic and Baggy Trousers!

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Radio and TV legend Pat Sharp has raided the vaults for the greatest sing-a-long hits of the '80s! Every tune is a belter, so grab that microphone - you're gonna need it!

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
25 sing-out-loud dance classics that'll leave you in waves of ecstasy - prepare to pump up the volume!

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Two hours of the biggest party tunes - all from 1989. Including Aerosmith, Deacon Blue, Soul II Soul, Stevie V, The Stone Roses and Madonna!
From Evelyn Thomas' High Energy in 1984, through Stock Aitken & Waterman and onto the breakout of happy house at the end of the decade, it's Sinitta's dance session - full of bounce!

programmes.show_name: It's The Wham Bam 80s Party Week!
programmes.show_description: A non-stop ticket to a week of retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Slap on some tight denim, fake tan, designer stubble and leather jackets - and that's just for the girls! This is how we partied in the disco-bopping 80s!
